EmailTemplate.description: When an opportunity created in marketing cloud gets closed, send a email to the user
EmailTemplate.name: Mobile Welcome Educate Me
EmailTemplate.subject: Thanks for your subscribe!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Angela,
Thank you for subscribing Digital Bank Retirement Account. Please find any relevant information regarding terms & conditions and how to manage your monthly rate here.
Thanks, {!Organization.Name}
Visit our website
Digital Bank is an initiative by Deloitte Digital
